overview: The only daughter of wealthy Wall Street banker, Evelyn Murray, while with her aristocratic fianc√©, Bert Van Vliet, runs down and injures newsboy Terry McGuire. To avoid an embarrassing outcome, Bert persuades her to flee the scene of the accident. Evelyn is conscience-stricken and informs her father; he is then forced to pay "hush money" to a garage attendant who has witnessed the accident.
tagline: She Tossed Away Riches-Why? Which Comes First-Conscience or Wealth?
title: Hush Money
